sense.gloss: part (esp. of the body), region, site, cut (of meat)

meanings: counter for copies of a newspaper or magazine

sdata.j: サッカーは、ゴールキーパーがゴールを↑守↑↓まも↓るために↑体↑↓からだ↓のすべての|↑部位|↑↓ぶい↓を↑使↑↓つか↓える↑以外↑↓いがい↓は、↑他↑↓た↓のプレイヤーは↑腕↑↓うで↓でボールに↑触↑↓ふ↓れてはならないというスポーツです。
sdata.e: Soccer is a sport in which players can't touch the ball with their arms, except for the keeper, who can use his whole body to defend the goal.

sdata.j: この↑予防↑↓よぼう↓↑接種↑↓せっしゅ↓は、↑接種|↑↓せっしゅ↓↑部位|↑↓ぶい↓が↑赤↑↓あか↓く↑腫↑↓は↓れる↑場合↑↓ばあい↓があります。
sdata.e: There are incidents where this vaccine has caused a red swelling at the location where it was injected.
